introduction: SYNOPSISDetective Lee and Ju-sik's relationship is that of a detective and ex-con. On the day Ju-sik is released from prison, Lee tries to persuade him to a new life but Ju-sik just sneers at him. After a few days, a jewelry store is robbed and Ju-sik is a suspect. But Ju-sik has married Kyong-suk and is apparently living honestly. He doesn't seem to have a motive. On the other hand, Ju-sik is planning a holdup to get money for his wife's surgery. But his plans fail as Lee had been following him. Lee is happy to realize that Ju-sik is not the criminal of the jewelry store. Lee gets the money for the surgery and goes to the hospital but it is too late. Ju-sik's wife is dead. At the funeral, Lee goes to Ju-sik when he surprisingly finds a jewelry box next to Ju-sik, Breaking down into tears, Ju-sik cries out that everything is futile.故事由于正规侦探与犯罪分子之间的关系，释放股票的当天，李继勇说服了康复，但是股票是愤世嫉俗的。几天后，一位珠宝商盗窃了一名小偷，股票成为了一名嫌犯。另一方面，股票未能规划街头盗窃，以便让妻子为手术付费。跟随他的移民很高兴知道他不是这个案子的凶手。移民找医院进行手术，但是该股的妻子已经死亡。在葬礼上拜访股票的移民惊奇地看到股票旁边的珠宝商股票。股票呼喊，一切都是空的。
